result.purpose: Responsible for managing and executing scheduled tasks (cron jobs) within the application.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, utilizing dependency injection to manage services and configurations for cron jobs.

cmd/cron_job/config.go.purpose: Defines configuration structure for cron jobs in the application.

cmd/cron_job/main.go.purpose: Initializes and starts a cron jobs application with configuration and logging.

cmd/cron_job/wire.go.purpose: This file sets up dependency injection for cron job services in the application.

cmd/cron_job/wire_gen.go.purpose: Generates dependency injection code for cron job services using Wire.
